comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: The figure may be in a dress, but the face looks like a boy, in his schoolcap! Actually the face doesn't seem to match the outfit, size-wise. Either way, I love that bike!!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: If you trawl thru the NLA digitised newspapers during the 1890s and early 1900s period, you find occasional reports of bicycle clubs holding festive processions on machines decorated with streamers and Japanese lanterns.
